name: tap water production, underground water with disinfection | tap water | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/20328/documentation

This dataset is created as a child of the global dataset with edited production volume for this geography.;;This dataset represents production of 1 kg of tap water under pressure at facility gate, ready for distribution in network. This dataset is approximating the inventory for underground water pumping and disinfection using chlorine using data from two facilities of different technology in Quebec. Chlorine consumption is estimated using data from the artificial recharged wells dataset and energy inputs are estimated using data from underground water without treatment dataset.;[This dataset is meant to replace the following datasets:; - tap water production and supply, GLO, 2000 - 2000 (58c7c438-e3f3-49e2-a66c-e494dc0dbb20)]

From the intake pumping of raw surface water into the water treatment plant. 

This dataset ends with the production of tap water, at facility gate, under pressure. It includes energy for intake pumping, lighting and heating of the building as well as the energy of the pump pressurizing water to the beginning of the network. Infrastructure for the facility is estimated. It excludes energy for pumping stations and water losses within the network which is included in the tap water market. Emissions to the environment occurring during the treatment and during the distribution were not considered as they are assumed negligible. Main substance in water that would be released in the environment are assumed to be considered in wastewater processes.
category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/36:Water collection, treatment and supply/360:Water collection, treatment and supply/3600:Water collection, treatment and supply

processDocumentation.timeDescription: The time period is set from 2012 to the year 2017 as it is the latest update period for data.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Extrapolated from data from two plants in Quebec (Canada).The uncertainty was adjusted accordingly.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: Underground water with disinfection accounts for 13.4% of the total tap water supply. The data was extrapolated from two underground water with disinfection tap water production facilities in Quebec (Canada). The South African production volumen data was used for regionalizing the dataset, the remaining exchanges were copied from the global dataset. The uncertainty has been changed accordingly.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Based on data collected from two treatment plants using underground water and with disinfection, located in  Quebec (Canada). See corresponding Quebec dataset for more information.

EcoSpold01Location=UCTE
Estimated value,taken from the "tap water production, underground water with disinfection, GLO" dataset (accessed 20170920) as it was considered adequate also for this dataset. Represents electricity consumption for pumping underground water and pressurizing tap water at facility gate. Value is based on energy consumption from the underground without treatment dataset.
